column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We need something like this in Florida. Started with a great glass of Elijah Craig Bourbon on a "Kind Cube". They have some pretty sick sourdough bread
column2: but the house made bacon on the "wedge" salad (really a whole head of lettuce) was unreal. This is a thick cut bacon but it's really slab
column3: which was delicious. The bacon outshines the salad
column4: but I'm ok with that. I next tried the Short Rib Stroganoff
column5: which I wouldn't order if it wasn't made with Short-Rib. That was the game changer on this dish
column7: which was pretty good itself. Great dinner
